channel.title: MoparClassic
channel.description: Was wondering, was the Object Spamming packet crash fixed in it?

item.title: MoparClassic
item.description:
@5_1 wrote:

[quote=“Not_a_bot, post:39, topic:405449”][quote author=5 1 link=topic=502436.msg3693213#msg3693213 date=1312256670]

LOL. Jokes on you guys for thinking that’s the only exploit.

Who said that? lol

Few people have including code4fame

I never said that was the only exploit…

I can almost guarantee there are other exploits due to the code being so poorly written…

If I had the time I would go look back at your posts =P
[/quote]

No… that was a false assumption on your part. Clearly you had the intent to say it when you stated “LOL. Jokes on you guys for thinking that’s the only exploit.”.[/quote]
That’s cool, good to know.

Read full topic

item.title: MoparClassic
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

xEnt:

running a bot script in client to basically while(true) useObject(1); or some shit like that, with auto reconnect on while the process of logging in is happening and server-side the player is not officially logged in, i’m sure the usage of using an object whilst your barely logged in will cause some null pointer exceptions, easy fix though.

It wouldn’t even matter if it did cause a NPE… The exception will be caught…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:

item.title: MoparClassic
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:17, topic:405449”][quote author=Anc13ntsIsBack link=topic=502436.msg3676666#msg3676666 date=1311285327]

Was wondering, was the Object Spamming packet crash fixed in it, so I can rip it out and give no credits?

^Fixed.
When Do You Learn to Write Normally Like Other People Do?

More like,
Was wondering, was the Object Spamming packet crash fixed in it, so I can rip it out
If I can’t figure it out, I’d obviously ask someone else. All I know is it can happen in RscAngel sources, and if MoparClassic didn’t have it fixed, it could happen to them as well, but seeing as CodeForFame is fixing it.

fix it urself u absolute inbred

Says the person who has paid a lot of people to fix things, not saying its a bad thing since its development. I’m not sure why you don’t like me since I never did anything to you, nor your server unlike you.

Edit: CodeForFame, once you fix it can you let me know\post below please. (The Connection Throttler you said you were fixing).
[/quote]
No, you can monitor GitHub though…[/quote]
About to PM you with exactly how its done.

Read full topic
